content: {"name": "North Brooklyn Angels - Mobile Soup Kitchen(Manhattan Ave.)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "The truck is parked in front of the steps of the St. Anthony of Padua - St. Alphonsus church at the intersection of Manhattan Avenue and Milton Street.\n\n", "email": "", "url": "https://www.northbrooklynangels.org/meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "862 Manhattan Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Greenpoint", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11222", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7293739, "longitude": -73.95364359999999}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Mobile soup kitchen truck"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Bulk food distribution is via: Free pop up green markets at meal sites."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
